original: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni /
translated: The meditation on reality by those of the highest capacity is as follows:

original: lhar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas /
analyzed: lhar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas /
translated: Having generated yourself as the deity and inserted emptiness, the mind is the clear light, naturally pure, not generated by any cause.

original: rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig / zhe 'dod thams cad dang @27b bral pa'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i shes pa de kho nal gnas pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig / zhe 'dod thams cad dang @27b bral pa'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i shes pa de kho nal gnas pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: Since it is not destroyed by any condition, it is sealed with emptiness, free from all wishes. Abiding in that alone is the dharmakaya.

original: shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang ma bral ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang ma bral ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Since the essence of consciousness is not established and one is never separate from the experience of naturally luminous awareness, that is the sambhogakaya.

original: shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: Since that very clear consciousness appears without any nature, that is the nirmanakaya.

original: rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste /
translated: Since one meditates on the inseparability of the three kayas at the time of the cause, one attains the three kayas as the result.

original: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku /
analyzed: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku /
translated: The perfect abandonment and primordial wisdom is the dharmakāya.

original: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: The bodhisattvas on the tenth bhūmi, endowed with the major and minor marks, are the saṃbhogakāya.

original: rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te /
analyzed: rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te /
translated: The appearances of the six classes of beings are the nirmāṇakāya.
This is the attainment of the result, the three kāyas.

original: dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The meditation on suchness by those of the highest capacity, composed by the master Mañjuśrīmitra, is complete.
